title: Ex-lottery security officer charged with rigging more games
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Authorities on Friday filed new charges against a former Iowa lottery security officer who was convicted months ago of rigging a Hot Lotto g... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
